summary: A simple, straightforward mod that adds two standalone vanity items; Heisenberg's Shades and Hat
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=https://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim][img]http://i.imgur.com/SkMFU4n.png[/img]

[/url][/center][center]Heisenberg's Shades [b]DO NOT[/b] take up the helmet slot, so they can be worn with hooded robes too!
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Aa3ccf8.jpg[/img][/center]
[b][color=#ff0000][u][center][size=5]UPDATE NOTICE[/size][/center][/u][/color][/b]
To update this mod you first need to delete the old heisenberg.esp from your skyrim/data folder and then replace it with the new Heisenberg - Johnskyrim.esp. This new update file moves Walt's Lockbox to inside the front gates of Whiterun so that it no longer conflicts with JK's Skyrim. The dirty edit has also been removed so that the lockbox will no longer override an NPC strongbox.


[b]About[/b]

With Breaking Bad returning to our TV screens this week, I thought it would be cool to pay homage with a simple mod that puts Heisenberg's Hat and Shades into the world of Skyrim. This was a quick mod and isn't meant to be taken seriously. [b]Overall, it's just for looks and fun :)[/b]

Both models and textures were created by me using 3ds Max 2011/2014 and Photoshop CS6.

[b][color=#ffff00]What this mod includes:[/color][/b] Heisenberg's Hat and Glasses. Equip-able by all races and gender. 

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[b]Location[/b]

You will find the items in Walt's Strongbox at the inner front gates of Whiterun.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[b]Installation:[/b]

Extract the files of the archive to your Skyrim Data Folder. Remember to enable the .ESP in your launcher!

Heisenberg - Johnskyrim.esp
meshes/armor/heisenberg
textures/armor/heisenberg

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[b]Uninstall Instructions:[/b]

Simply delete the following files/folders:

Heisenberg - Johnskyrim.esp
meshes/armor/heisenberg
textures/armor/heisenberg

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[b]Questions:[/b]

Q. Who is Heisenberg?
A. Heisenberg is the main character in the TV show, Breaking Bad. These are his signature items.

Q. Do these do anything?
A. No, they're purely cosmetic.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[b]Notes:[/b]

There are a few clipping errors with certain races, such as Elves and Orcs. Orc Males are the worst. Seeing as this was a quick mod, it's unlikely I'll work on it further!

It removes your hair, cos you know, Heisenberg has no hair.

Also the collisions for the ground are way off. I am not yet educated in doing 100% accurate ones, if anyone can help, that'd be awesome!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
If for some reason the files do not work, cause crashes
or any other problems, please do not hesitate to contact me.

All screenshots are taken directly from the game and resized down from 1920x1080 to 1280x720. No other editing has been done. [b]Please feel free to add your own![/b]

Thanks and I hope you enjoy this Skyrim Mod!

PS. DO NOT UPLOAD THIS FILE ANYWHERE ELSE!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[center][color=yellow][b]
Please check out my other mods![/b][/color]
